edl.name: Mealbux Subsidy Request
edl.title: Mealbux Subsidy Request
edl.createInstructions: This application is due first Friday of the term. Please verify your information is correct below and fill in required fields:
edl.instructions: These are the plain instructions @todo: where is this used???

fieldDef.name: osuIncome
fieldDef.title: Personal Monthly Total Gross Income from OSU job(s)

fieldDef.name: nonosuIncome
fieldDef.title: Personal Monthly Total Income from non-OSU job(s)

fieldDef.name: spouseIncome
fieldDef.title: Spouse/Domestic Partner Monthly Total Income from job(s)

fieldDef.name: medicalExpenses
fieldDef.title: Medical Expenses (not covered by health insurance)

fieldDef.name: subsidyPrograms
fieldDef.title: Subsidy programs you'd like to apply for

div.h3: Attach a pay stub for each employment outside of OSU
div.p: Please use the notes section to attach files.

div.h3: Attach last month's receipt for each payment type
div.p: Please use the notes section to attach files.
